long_description: Heat up freeze-dried meals without using a stove! This flameless heating system is perfect for emergency preparedness or camping during burn bans. Reusable oven pouch contains everything needed to heat five meals. Simply prepare your meal as directed, slip it into pouch with heating packet, sit back and enjoy a hot meal in approximately 15 minutes. Kit contains reusable pinch-close oven pouch, five disposable heating packets, water bottle and five salt tablets. Made for use with Mountain House meals served in the new stand-up pouches, but works with other brand freeze-dried meals too. No toxic fumes released during the heating process. Caution: avoid touching escaping steam during the heating process--temperatures may reach 200deg F.
